Articles.Content:
Maybe a silly thing.. Not sure whether I'm missing something ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

QWEASD controls **suddenly** 'locked' while SAS is activated (auto SAS working). All works ok when SAS disabled.. ??

No Maneuver locking.. nutting! I've been playing for at least 2 weeks on this mod configuration.

Went though the 'settings.cfg' file.. no changes..

Re-install KSP essential file = nuts

Browse 'sfs' files = nuts

Mods

![ohnssdx.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ohnssdx.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-26T21:32:47Z" title="04/26/2015 09:32  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 26, 2015</time> by ColKlonk**
Not seeing RP-0 there, so I'm not causing the locking, at least. Not sure if anything else you have might do that...?
Looks like it has something to do with my changes to the original Mars mission ship - fark!!

I reckon don't worry too much about this one...

I took a working rocket and made the equivalent changes to the 'new' rocket.. and all works ok!!

Another 'sinkhole' for Mexico .. maybe ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Really annoying though.... out-of-the-blue bugs.. like pigs in sh1t barn ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Not seeing RP-0 there, so I'm not causing the locking, at least. Not sure if anything else you have might do that...?

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif):D

Not to worry... I'm setting my own missions/challenges...Nothing like pushing the reasonable limits
